entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 03:43 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except minus 2 near the Rockies.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except minus 2 near the Rockies. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:27 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:27 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:27 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
